author: sunsportonline
title: Burnley transfer news: Aston Villa will make a move for Burnley striker Ashley Barnes in a bid to help with their promotion push
text:
EFL Bruce goes Barnsey Burnley transfer news: Aston Villa will make a move for Burnley striker Ashley Barnes in a bid to help with their promotion push 
Steve Bruce has so far failed in his attempts to bring in Middlesbrough striker Jordan Rhodes who has a proven goal scoring record in the Championship By Dan Pellegrini
